actors.name: Arch
actors.description: A framed brick backdrop element with an arch that adds depth behind the main scene. Goes almost fully at the back of the Main Scene View.

actors.name: Pillars
actors.description: A row of tall, simple column-like panels/pillars arranged side-by-side. Goes behind the main scene view.

actors.name: ExpoLogo
actors.description: This geometric, multi-layered vertical display structure, composed of two overlapping rectangular panels resting on a low, horizontal base, is used as an ExpoLogo to showcase a company's name and logo.

actors.name: Two Columns Back
actors.description: One mirrored pairs of tall, segmented vertical columns arranged in the back of the scene , each featuring a mounted spotlight.

actors.name: Two Columns Front
actors.description: One mirrored pairs of tall, segmented vertical columns arranged in the front of the scene , each featuring a mounted spotlight.

actors.name: Four Columns
actors.description: One mirrored pairs of tall, segmented vertical columns arranged in the front of the scene , each featuring a mounted spotlight.

actors.name: RealState Columns
actors.description: Four columns that have mini Building replicas within, ideal for a RealState Studio.

actors.name: Roof1
actors.description: A layered ceiling structure composed of multiple rectangular light panels with evenly spaced spotlights and recessed black sections for depth.

actors.name: Roof2
actors.description: A rectangular ceiling panel featuring parallel lighting rails with multiple evenly spaced spotlights, framed by recessed dark sections for contrast.

actors.name: Floor
actors.description: Floor

actors.name: Platform1
actors.description: A large circular platform with a raised outer ring and a slightly recessed center area where the presenter stands.

actors.name: Platform2
actors.description: A large square platform

actors.name: Carpet1
actors.description: This large stage carpet displays an interlocking, repeating geometric pattern of textured rectangular and curved elements.

actors.description: Flat TV Screen on the Back of the Set

actors.name: ScreenBack Curve
actors.description: Curve TV Screen on the Back of the Set

actors.name: ScreenLeft Curve

actors.description: Flat TV Screen on the Right side of the Set

actors.name: ScreenRight Curve
actors.description: Curve TV Screen on the Right side of the Set

actors.name: Wall with Industrial Windows
actors.description: A large back wall featuring tall industrial windows and overhead spotlights for a dramatic, loft-style look. This is the backwall of the Set. Compatible with Paintings.

actors.name: Wall with a horizontal Beam
actors.description: A large rectangular wall panel with a central horizontal beam and evenly spaced vertical divisions running across its surface. No Windows

actors.name: Wall with Industrial Windows
actors.description: A large  back wall featuring tall industrial windows and overhead spotlights for a dramatic, loft-style look. This is the leftWall of the Set.

actors.name: Wall with a horizontal Beam
actors.description: A large rectangular wall panel with a central horizontal beam and evenly spaced vertical divisions running across its surface. No Windows

actors.name: Vertically Segmented Wall
actors.description: A large segmented wall panel divided into vertical sections, with evenly spaced mounted lights across its surface.

actors.name: Wall with Industrial Windows
actors.description: A large  back wall featuring tall industrial windows and overhead spotlights for a dramatic, loft-style look. This is the RightWall of the Set.

actors.name: Vertically Segmented Wall
actors.description: A large segmented wall panel divided into vertical sections, with evenly spaced mounted lights across its surface. No Windows

actors.name: Wall with a horizontal Beam
actors.description: A large rectangular wall panel with a central horizontal beam and evenly spaced vertical divisions running across its surface.

actors.name: VintageSofa
actors.description: A pair of vintage sofas. One in the center of the stage, one to the right side.

actors.name: VintageSofa
actors.description: A pair of vintage sofas. One in the center of the stage, one to the Left side.

actors.name: Paintings
actors.description: A Pair of Paintings. Exclusively Compatible with Brick Wall and Glass Wall.

actors.name: FurniturePreset1
actors.description: A Preset of Furniture set in the Back. Holds two shelves with plants in between.

actors.name: FurniturePreset1_NoPlants
actors.description: A Preset of Furniture set in the Back. Holds two shelves with NO plants

actors.name: BankDecoRoof
actors.description: A Deco Style Roof, especially made for Banks.

actors.name: Bank Columns
actors.description: Four Columns in Roman Style. Ideal for a Bank Style.

actors.name: Radial grid stage backdrop wall.
actors.description: This horizontal stage backdrop features a central, large circular element with a radial grid pattern, flanked by a rectangular wall containing two pairs of narrow vertical openings and overhead lighting fixtures.

actors.name: Sidewall with recessed entrance at the end.
actors.description: This stage sidewall consists of a flat, concrete-textured panel featuring a recessed rectangular entrance at one end.

actors.name: Sidewall with recessed entrance at the end.
actors.description: This stage sidewall consists of a flat, concrete-textured panel featuring a recessed rectangular entrance at one end.
